short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects if website is on Shopify and provides additional links and information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopify Detector 

It's great if you are a store owner or working as an agency or on multiple shopify stores. 

Detects if the current website is on Shopify or not. 
It it is on Shopify it will do the following. 

Quick access
It will display the following links. 
- Shopify admin dashboard
- Orders
- Products
- Theme customizer
- Edit current theme code 

Shopify Information
- Myshopify url
- Current Theme Installed
- Theme Id
- Country of the store
- Current currency
- Main Domain

You can also easily access:
- Shopify Status 
- The shop's sitemap
